page.title: 14EMPLOYMENT
page.content: MY DAD IS CALLED WILLIAM DAVID DEMPSTER.HE IS FORTY YEARS OLD AND HE IS AN ENGINEER AT LERWICK O.I.L. SHETLAND.HE IS ALSO A FOREMAN.DAD GETS UP AT 7.00am AND LEAVES FOR WORK AT ABOUT 7.30am.WHEN HE ARRIVES AT WORK HE MAKES SURE THAT ALL THE MACHINES AND MEN ARE WORKING PROPERLY.HE WORKS MAINLY WITH NUTS AND BOLTS AND REPAIRS DRILL PIPES FOR OFFSHORE DRILLING.HE WORKS AT SULLOM VOE AND THE POWER STATION.HE FINISHES WORK AT 5.00pm AND ARRIVES HOME ABOUT 20 MINUTES LATER.THE COMPANIES MY DAD WORKS WITH ARE B.P.,SHELL,SHEVRON AND THE HYDROBOARD.HE HAS WORKING DAYS,ANNUAL HOLIDAYS AND 8 STATUARY HOLIDAYS.AFTER HE ARRIVES HOME HE HAS HIS TEA AND GOES OUT FISHING IF IT IS FINE.SOME_ TIMES I GO TOO.
